Given this govt's support for mining, dergulation etc it seems likely that the environment we will be getting is going to be a dirty one."
https://t.co/VmcPuTpo8Y

@PCAPropertyCare Lenders, solicitor & the uninformed still refer to #Japanese #knotweed "#eradication" A BIG claim when it is a long-lived perennial & rhizomes recorded as able to remain dormant for years. 20 years stated in the old @EnvAgency code don't know where was cited from. Any idea?

Air Quality monitoring equipment has now been installed near to the Walleys quarry landfill by @EnvAgencyMids I hope it is picking up the awful odours experienced again today / this evening and that they finally accept the source and take action against the perpetrators. üò∑ https://t.co/lP9qd1flaF

Just to remind you all that just 24 hours ago the @EnvAgency admitted it will no longer be publishing serious pollution incidents and won't be recording them against their annual performance targets. https://t.co/Cu3VPjycTa

@paulthoro9ood @Nick_Unsworth @CllrRob @JamesAbbott2013 pls note.    @envAgency pls explain how Coggeshall is to be protected from surface water runoff and Robins Brook flooding by your proposed scheme?

Makes no sense that to 'protect' Coggeshall from flooding, @EnvAgency thinks a ¬£25m project (dam & quarry) on the Blackwater will help - look at the map - flooding from Robins Brook & surface water is a high proportion of the risk  @piersmeyler @BW_Times @SarahPhillips8 https://t.co/uNeNgbpqj9
This is appalling @EnvAgency https://t.co/UrBlTvQ5cP

Our water supplies are under pressure from climate change, population growth and drought.

We've launched a consultation on our updated map of the areas where this pressure could be greatest.

Help us safeguard future water supplies. Share your views here: https://t.co/WBWHPEVE9u https://t.co/smkQXkHtCJ

Dracula & #Japaneseknotweed - when you think you‚Äôve killed it you almost certainly haven‚Äôt, at least not in the way you think you have! For anyone managing knotweed, PCA's Peter Fitzsimons discusses why great care must be taken with management plans... https://t.co/zb7uO4T1AO

urls.title: How to help us count shad - Unlocking the Severn
urls.description: Help us monitor the annual shad migration by counting the number of fish successful swimming upstream at the notch in Upper Lode weir. We need the help and support of members of the public to help us monitor the rare twaite shad during their annual migration on the River Severn. So, if you have a few minutes to spare, please help us count shad and become a citizen scientist! The visual count by citizen scientists is an important part of our monitoring programme. It provides data and helps calibrate other

urls.title: Precious chalk stream in Bexley gets health boost - Thames21
urls.description: Bexley residents and local wildlife can now enjoy a healthier river Cray where it flows through Foots Cray Meadows, Bexley.Waterways charity Thames21 has carried out restoration work on an 800m stretch of the river

tweets.text:
We're restoring an 800m stretch of the river Cray in #Bexley to help it flow more naturally & help plants, fish & birds to thrive, in partnership with @EnovertCT @LBofBexley & @EnvAgency üíß
Read about the positive impact the works will have here üëâ
https://t.co/EyyUOjZ3Fl https://t.co/m0VIlriIZs

entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.

entity.name: Quarter-Final
entity.description: The Players Championship features the top 16 snooker players on the one-year ranking list. It's headed by World Number One Judd Trump, who defends the title he won so convincingly last season; beating Yan Bingtao 10-4 in the final. The tournament is the second of three that make up the Cazoo Series. Following the World Grand Prix in December, the Players Championship offers the chance to win valuable ranking points ahead of the series finale in March.
